TopicTitle: Pretentious Kerman's Unnecessary Report - on Successful Docking? (Makes me think the ship blew up again)

Articles.Content:
I'm sitting there, gingerly trying to get two ships to dock, hoping to not bash one into oblivion again - when Pretentious Kerman's Instant Report pops up - with the exact same sound as it's 'you goofed' report - and my natural thought is, "I've killed another Kerbal".

Nope.

The ships merely docked this time.

I'm a fan of doing away with that huge space-hawg of a report all together, but maybe if it's required, change the success sound?

Edited March 11, 2023 by JoeSchmuckatelli
Well, that name is a bit awkward... Do you think there's a Cracker Kerman in the list for parity's sake?

28 minutes ago, FleshJeb said:

Well, that name is a bit awkward... Do you think there's a Cracker Kerman in the list for parity's sake?

I'm not sure I get what your saying.

Got a better appellation for this guy?

37 minutes ago, FleshJeb said:

Well, that name is a bit awkward... Do you think there's a Cracker Kerman in the list for parity's sake?

Ah.

I went and googled.

Now I see what your concern is.

Noted.  

Title changed.

Oh sorry, I thought it was in the name list in the program. I figured it made a good ancillary bug report, because there's no way a corporation would want to let that continue.

12 minutes ago, JoeSchmuckatelli said:

Got a better appellation for this guy?

For a pretentious kerbal, it's hilarious--Space is up after all!

Unfortunately humans play this game, and I've seen Jatwaa have to gracefully handle some extraordinarily nasty comments. (I also had occasion to learn that he's as fantastic a guy off-camera as he is on.)
Never even occurred to me.  Appreciate the abundance of caution.
